price: 46. Dieną, kai jų planai nesuteiks pagalbos, ir niekas jiems nepadės (kai jie gaus bausmę Pragare).
arabic: يَوۡمَ لَا يُغۡنِي عَنۡهُمۡ كَيۡدُهُمۡ شَيۡـٔٗا وَلَا هُمۡ يُنصَرُونَ

version.title: Lithuanian Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Lithuanian By Rowwad Translation Center with cooperation with Islamhouse.com

meta.transliteration: yawma lā yugh'nī ʿanhum kayduhum shayan walā hum yunṣarūna
